column6:
-1 min highway access located on a quiet cul-de-sac
-Bright, sun-lit, comfy, private secured guest room & full bath 
-40'' TV in Room with Roku/Apple TV Access
-Entertainment-centric child-free pet-free comfort setting
-Direct TV 
-Living room with 70'' TV
-Flexible 24 hour check-in for your convenience
-Driveway parking available (Park on right side)

-If you need to stay longer than 30 days you will need to make 2 separate bookings.
